name: Playful Math
description:
Playful math is a simple game, that tries to teach kids a fun way the basics of mathematics. It is suitable for preschool children and others in primary school. Features:

  • image counting (up to 10)
  • addition, subtraction (up to 10, 20, 50, 100)
  • multiplication and division (with a factor of 5,9,10)
  • comparing larger and smaller numbers
  • rounding to dozens

You can set a time limit or the number of examples. Unnecessary types of examples can be hidden.

Available in english and česky.
